column1: #   HDIC Project
#   Integrated Database of Hanzi Dictionaries in Early Japan
#   TSJ: Tenjibon Shinsen Jikyo database -- Full list of headwords
#   Tenjibon Shinsen Jikyo 新撰字鏡, Tenji copy 天治本.
#   A complete manuscript of 1124 is held by the Imperial Household Archives.
#   Buddhist monk Shoju 昌住, c. 898-901.
#   A Hanzi (Chinese character) dictionary.
#   TSJ_entries.txt -- Test version
#   Version: 1.0.1
#   Date published: 24 June 2018
#   Last modified: 24 June 2018
#   Copyright (c) 2018 HDIC project, IKEDA Shoju (Chair)

column2: LI Yuan (Person in charge of text data proofreading)
LIU Guanwei (Person in charge of image database design and implementation)

column1: #   Department of Linguistic Sciences, Hokkaido University Graduate School of Letters
#   North 10, West 7, Kita-ku Sapporo, Hokkaido, 060-0810 Japan
#   Contact: hdic_info@let.hokudai.ac.jp
#   Feel free to copy and distribute.
#   Send bug reports and feature requests via email.
#   TSV format information
#   SJID (svvwwxyyz)         Book(vv), leaf(ww), recto-verso(x), line(yy) and number(z)
#   SJ2ID                    For headword of two or more characters, add 'a, b, ..., n' at the end of SJID
#   SJ_Rinsen (新xxx-yz)     Page(xxx), line(y) and number(z) in Rinsen shoten edition
#   SJ_vol_radical (xx#yyy)  Volume(xx) and radical number(yyy)
#   SJ_radical               Radical of Chinese character
#   Entry                    Headword
#   Entry_original           Headword based on original image
#   SJ_sources               Yiqiejingyinyi, Qieyun, Yupian, etc. (For details, refer to the following section)
#   SJ_entry_remarks         Editor's notes
#   TBID (v_www_xyz)         Book(v), leaf(www), recto-verso(x), line(y) and number(z)
#   SYID (vwwwxyyzz)         Book(v), leaf(www), recto-verso(x), line(yy) and number(z)
#   Abbreviations
#   TB: Tenrei Bansho Meigi 篆隸萬象名義, Kosanji copy 高山寺本
#   SY: Songben Yupian 宋本玉篇, Zecuntang edition 澤存堂本
#   SJ: Shinsen Jikyo 新撰字鏡, Tenji copy 天治本
#   KW: Shinsen Jikyo 新撰字鏡, Kyowa print 享和本
#   SJ_sources
#   Yiqiejingyinyi related parts 一切經音義部分
#    一切經音義: Yiqiejingyinyi related items 一切經音義引用項目
#    一切經音義N: Non-Yiqiejingyinyi related items 非一切經音義項目
#   Qieyun related parts 切韻引用部分
#    切韻A: Qieyun A, four tones noted as a whole, with the title of Qieyun. 四声一括注記。有切韻書名。e.g., 已上卅八字平聲…已上上々聲…已上去聲…已上出自切韻.
#    切韻B: Qieyun B, four tones noted as a whole, without the title of Qieyun. 四声一括注記。無切韻書名。e.g., 以上入聲…次去聲…次上聲…次平聲…已上四聲了.

#    切韻C: Qieyun C, even (level; 平) tone noted as a whole, while rising (上) tone, departing (going; 去) tone, and entering (checked; 入) tone noted under fanqie, without the title of Qieyun. 平声一括注記。有上・去・入声注記、在反切之下。無切韻書名。
#    切韻D: Qieyun D, four tones noted under fanqie, without the title of Qieyun. Items mentioned above are all Qieyun related parts. 有四声注記、在反切之下。無切韻書名。以上、切韻引用条目。
#    切韻N: Non-Qieyun related items 非切韻引用項目
#   Yupian related parts 玉篇引用部分
#    玉篇: Yupian related items 玉篇引用項目
#    玉篇N: Non-Yupian related items 非玉篇引用項目
#   Other parts 其他部分
#    出所不詳: Unidentified parts, unknown sources
#    辨別不能: Unseparated parts, mixed sources
#    爾雅: Erya
#    本草: Herbal book 本草木、本草草、本草鳥
#    小學篇: Shōgakuhen, a dictionary of Kokuji (Chinese characters created in Japan)
#    臨時雜要字: Rinjizōyōji, a daily dictionary of Sino-Japanese words in early Japan
#    添加項目: Additional items by people of later times
#   References
#   Sakakura Atsuyosi 阪倉 篤義. 1967. Shinsen jikyō no saikentō: Kyōwabon o chūshin ni 新撰字鏡の再檢討―享和本を中心に―. In Yamada Tadao 山田 忠雄 (ed.), Honpō jishoshi ronsō 本邦辭書史論叢, 359—392. Tokyo :Sanseidō 三省堂.
#   Ueda Tadashi 上田 正. 1981. Shinsen jikyō no Setsuin bubun ni tsuite [On quotations from Qieyun in the Shinsen jikyō] 新撰字鏡の切韻部分について. Kokugogaku 127. 13—20.
#   Ueda Tadashi 上田 正. 1984. Setsuin itsubun no kenkyū [A study of fragments of the Qieyun] 切韻逸文の研究. Tokyo: Kyūko shoin 汲古書院.
#   Ueda Tadashi 上田 正. 1986. Gyokuhen hansetsu sōran [A complete list of fanqie in the original Yupian] 玉篇反切總覽. Kobe: Private edition.
#   Sadakari Itoku 貞苅 伊徳. 1998. Shinsen jikyō no kenkyū [A study of Shinsen jikyō] 新撰字鏡の研究. Tokyo: Kyūko shoin 汲古書院.
#   Primary Sources
#   Yuanben Yupian 原本玉篇. Tōhō bunka sōsho dairoku 東方文化叢書第六, Tokyo: Tōhō bunka gakuin, 1932
#   Songben Yupian 宋本玉篇. Kunaichō shoryōbu zō Daikō ekikai Gyokuhen 宮内廳書陵部藏大廣益會玉篇 (box 515, no.106, photographic images).
#   Tenreibanshōmeigii 篆隸萬象名義.Kōsanji shiryō sōsho 高山寺資料叢書 6, Tokyo: Tokyo daigaku shuppankai, 1977.
#   Shinsenjikyō 新撰字鏡. Tenjibon Shinsen jikyō revised edition 天治本新撰字鏡增訂版, Kyoto: Rinsen shoten, 1973
#   Ruijumyōgishō 類聚名義抄 (Zushoryōbon 圖書寮本). Zushoryōbon Ruiju myōgishō 圖書寮本類聚名義抄, Tokyo: Kunaichō Shoryōbu, Insatsu benridō, 1950.
#   Ruijumyōgishō 類聚名義抄 (Kanchi'inbon 觀智院本). Tenri toshokan zenbon sōsho washo no bu 天理圖書館善本叢書和書之部33, Tokyo: Yagi shoten, 1976.
#   Acknowledgments
#   We are grateful to the Imperial Household Archives 宮内廳書陵部 for permission to publish the decipherment text of TSJ.
#   This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI Grant Number 25370506, 16H03422.
SJID
